languages.text: "Все, что требуется от тебя — это смирно играть отведенную роль в предстоящей грезе. Можно сказать, я верну тебя в твою родную среду — в определенном смысле. Если же начнешь выходить из роли — я сделаю так, чтобы ты горько пожалел{mf||а} об этом".

"All that is required of you is that you quietly play your part. I will even go so far as to put you in your native surroundings... in a manner of speaking. But if I see you stepping out of your role, I will make sure that you bitterly regret it."
languages.original_text: "Все, что требуется от тебя — это смирно играть отведенную роль в предстоящей грезе. Можно сказать, я верну тебя в твою родную среду — в определенном смысле. Если же начнешь выходить из роли — я сделаю так, чтобы ты горько пожалел{mf||а} об этом".

traits.locale_text: "All you have to do is play your part with humility. I made an effort to ensure that... the environment is both familiar and comfortable to you. One could say you will be in your native surroundings. But if you start stepping out of the role, I will make sure that you bitterly regret it."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.locale_text: "All you have to do is play your part with humility. I made an effort to ensure that... the environment is both familiar and comfortable to you. One could say you will be in your native surroundings. But if you start stepping out of the role, I will make sure that you bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: "All that is required of you is that you quietly play your part. I will even go so far as to put you in your native surroundings... in a manner of speaking. But if I see you stepping out of your role, I will make sure that you bitterly regret it."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: « Tout ce que l'on attend de vous, c'est que vous jouiez tranquillement votre rôle. J'irai même jusqu'à vous replacer dans votre environnement d'origine... en quelque sorte. Mais si je vous vois sortir de votre rôle, je ferai en sorte que vous le regrettiez amèrement. »
languages.original_text: "All that is required of you is that you quietly play your part. I will even go so far as to put you in your native surroundings... in a manner of speaking. But if I see you stepping out of your role, I will make sure that you bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce que l'on attend de vous, c'est que vous jouiez tranquillement votre rôle. J'irai même jusqu'à vous replacer dans votre environnement d'origine... en quelque sorte. Mais si je vous vois sortir de votre rôle, je ferai en sorte que vous le regrettiez amèrement. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: “你要做的事情，就是老老实实扮演你该扮演的角色。说不定，我还会让你回到你熟悉的那些东西身边……从某种意义上而言。不过，如果你不肯好好配合，我一定会让你后悔不已。”
languages.original_text: "All that is required of you is that you quietly play your part. I will even go so far as to put you in your native surroundings... in a manner of speaking. But if I see you stepping out of your role, I will make sure that you bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: “你要做的事情，就是老老实实扮演你该扮演的角色。说不定，我还会让你回到你熟悉的那些东西身边……从某种意义上而言。不过，如果你不肯好好配合，我一定会让你后悔不已。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: 「お前に求められるのは、自分の役割を静かに果たすことだけだ。そのためなら、お前を馴染みのある環境に置いてやるつもりでもいる…一応はな。だが、もしお前が自分の役割から外れるようなことがあれば、激しく後悔させてやるぞ」
languages.original_text: "All that is required of you is that you quietly play your part. I will even go so far as to put you in your native surroundings... in a manner of speaking. But if I see you stepping out of your role, I will make sure that you bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: 「お前に求められるのは、自分の役割を静かに果たすことだけだ。そのためなら、お前を馴染みのある環境に置いてやるつもりでもいる…一応はな。だが、もしお前が自分の役割から外れるようなことがあれば、激しく後悔させてやるぞ」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: "Ihr müsst dabei einfach nur Eure Rolle spielen. Und ich werde Euch dabei in Eure heimische Umgebung stecken, zumindest in gewisser Weise. Aber wenn ich erlebe, dass Ihr aus Eurer Rolle fallt, werdet Ihr das bitter bereuen."
languages.original_text: "All that is required of you is that you quietly play your part. I will even go so far as to put you in your native surroundings... in a manner of speaking. But if I see you stepping out of your role, I will make sure that you bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst dabei einfach nur Eure Rolle spielen. Und ich werde Euch dabei in Eure heimische Umgebung stecken, zumindest in gewisser Weise. Aber wenn ich erlebe, dass Ihr aus Eurer Rolle fallt, werdet Ihr das bitter bereuen."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: «Lo único que preciso de ti es que representes tu papel discretamente. Incluso pienso devolverte a tu entorno natural... por decirlo de algún modo. Pero como vea que te sales del papel, me aseguraré de que lo lamentes amargamente».
languages.original_text: "All that is required of you is that you quietly play your part. I will even go so far as to put you in your native surroundings... in a manner of speaking. But if I see you stepping out of your role, I will make sure that you bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: «Lo único que preciso de ti es que representes tu papel discretamente. Incluso pienso devolverte a tu entorno natural... por decirlo de algún modo. Pero como vea que te sales del papel, me aseguraré de que lo lamentes amargamente».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: "Senden tek istediğim, sessizce rolünü oynaman. Rüyada seni bir nevi tanıdığın, bildiğin bir ortama sokacağım hatta. Fakat rolünden çıktığını görürsem seni buna bin pişman edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "All that is required of you is that you quietly play your part. I will even go so far as to put you in your native surroundings... in a manner of speaking. But if I see you stepping out of your role, I will make sure that you bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: "Senden tek istediğim sessizce rolünü oynaman. Hatta çevren bile tanıdık olacak. Tabiri caizse. Rolünden çıktığını görürsem ama, bundan büyük pişmanlık duymanı sağlayacağım."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
